virtual FastaSequence claragenomics::FastaParser::get_sequence_by_id ( int32_t  id) const
pure virtual

Fetch an entry from the FASTA file by index position in file.

Parameters
idPosition of sequence in file. If id is greater than file size, an error is thrown.
Returns
A FastaSequence object describing the entry.

Fetch an entry from the FASTA file by name.

Parameters
